channel.title: CVE Feed for Electrolink -- Compact DAB Transmitter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Electrolink -- Compact DAB Transmitter

item.title: CVE-2024-3742|2024-05-28T16:52:22.524Z -- electrolink -- compact%20dab%20transmitter
item.description: Electrolink transmitters store credentials in clear-text. Use of these credentials could allow an attacker to access the system.
